mapper.select: SELECT h_image1, book_indate, book_outdate, book_num, h_name, room_num, book_joindate , CONCAT(TO_DATE(book_outdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(book_indate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '박') AS day FROM project_booking book, project_hotel hotel WHERE u_num = #{u_num} AND book.h_num = hotel.h_num

SELECT userPoint.p_status , userPoint.p_point , userPoint.p_remaining , userPoint.p_contents , userPoint.p_joindate , userPoint.p_num , userPoint.book_num , userPoint.u_num FROM project_userpoint userPoint WHERE userPoint.u_num = #{u_num}

SELECT AA.h_image1 , AA.h_name , AA.h_grade , AA.h_address , CASE WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 1 THEN '★☆☆☆☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 2 THEN '★★☆☆☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 3 THEN '★★★☆☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 4 THEN '★★★★☆' WHEN ROUND(AA.reviewAvg) = 5 THEN '★★★★★' ELSE '☆☆☆☆☆' END AS reviewStar , NVL(AA.reviewAvg, 0) AS reviewAvg , AA.reviewCnt FROM ( SELECT hotel.h_image1 , hotel.h_name , hotel.h_grade , hotel.h_address , (SELECT AVG(sub1.review_star) FROM project_review sub1 WHERE sub1.h_num = hotel.h_num GROUP BY sub1.h_num) AS reviewAvg , (SELECT COUNT(sub1.review_star) FROM project_review sub1 WHERE sub1.h_num = hotel.h_num) AS reviewCnt FROM project_wishlist wishlist , project_hotel hotel WHERE wishlist.u_num = #{u_num} AND wishlist.h_num = hotel.h_num ) AA
select room_type from project_room where room_num = #{room_num}
select review_image from project_review where review_num=#{review_num}
